title: Decision-Making
verses: James 1:5 (WEB) — “If any of you lacks wisdom, let him ask of God… and it will be given.”
Proverbs 3:5–6 (WEB) — “Trust in Yahweh… he will make your paths straight.”
Proverbs 16:3 (WEB) — “Commit your deeds to Yahweh, and your plans shall succeed.”
Colossians 3:15 (WEB) — “Let the peace of Christ rule in your hearts.”
body: Good decisions grow from prayer, Scripture, counsel, and patience. Clarify the options, motives, and likely fruit. Choose the path that most loves God and neighbor.
prayer: Wise Father, give me clarity and courage. Close the wrong doors and open the right ones. Lead me in Your wisdom and peace. Amen.
